arts.ttl: Denis Bouanga, Hugo Lloris lead LAFC over Minnesota United 1-0 for third straight shutout victory
arts.sum: Denis Bouanga scored on a first-half penalty kick and Hugo Lloris made it stand up for his third straight clean sheet as Los Angeles FC edged Minnesota United 1-0 on Wednesday night. Lloris finished with three saves for his league-high-tying ninth clean sheet of the season for LAFC (10-5-5).
